website_summaries.verdict: The perfection of the brand isn't just for fountain pens: this sophisticated ballpoint version will turn heads as well as provide a superior writing experience.
pros: Mechanism to use and retract pen is sturdy, and overall construction allows pen to be kept in a pocket or purse without coming apart
Users love the look, feel, and curve of the pen, and the chrome exterior gives it a polished, professional appearance
cons: Refills are a bit on the small – and pricey – side, so may want to buy them in bulk

customer_reviews.title: Handy Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This is my third LAMY Pico pen as I find them very handy to carry in my pocket. The only issue I have with them is that since they are small and the barrel is "polished", it falls out of my pocket when I'm sitting and reach for change in my pocket (drive-thru). After loosing two (over five years), I put a rubber "sleeve" (about 1" long) around the pen (from a cheap ballpoint) that provides some resistance inside the pocket. This works well and actually helps me hold the pen when writing with it.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Best pen to always carry with you.......
customer_reviews.text: I have own several of these pens over the years. One is always in one of my pockets. Easy to carry with you. No sharp edges. Small smooth. Easy to work pen when you need a pen to sign anything. Refills are available. They are also unique and often people will ask where did I find these. My first was found in a formal stationary store but now there are several colors available on Amazon. My always with me pen. Works great and will last for many years. Very well made product. Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: FrankMD

customer_reviews.title: helpful for achy hands
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of writing and recently began having increased hand pain. I like the Lamy writing products and own a few pens. When I saw the Pico, I had to give it a try. Thankful, it is easier than my thinner pens. Of course, it doesn't take away the pain, but its thickness makes it easier to write with. Expect normal Lamy ballpoint quality from the ink and pen itself. I just wish it had a clip. This is a winner for me. I may end up with all the colors! Sadly, after about a month, I've lost this pen. I got another in white. Same quality and experience. Hopefully, I don't lose this one.
customer_reviews.author: clinton mayo

customer_reviews.title: Love this pen!
customer_reviews.text: I generally carry a pen in my pocket and this has go to be the best one I've ever had. Firstly, it's a Lamy so I do love how it writes and secondly, I love that it's small and compact. I don't smoke but it looks like a fancy cigarette when I'm twiddling it in my hand. I've grown attached to this particular matte silver one since unlike the chrome one it doesn't smudge up with fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Dayrit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pocket pen
customer_reviews.text: Love the smoothness and the feel of this pen. Writes great. Perfect travel pen. No caps to deal with. Love the design and compactness.
customer_reviews.author: ASH62

customer_reviews.title: best extension pen
customer_reviews.text: I've had a fisher extension pen for years this lamy is smaller yet expands longer. fatter which is easy to hold given larger hands. because it's a push to trigger open, I've not had this pen unwantedly open in my pocket. this is a really great pen. writes very well even sideways. comfortable to write with. love this pen. hats off to the designer.
customer_reviews.author: Watasnozle

customer_reviews.title: Great small pen for pocket
customer_reviews.text: I have been a fisher space pen (pocket bullet model) for years, heard a review on this pen, and what a great purchase it is - very well designed and built. Writes well. After using it for a month, very glad I saw the review on the pen.
customer_reviews.author: Rockey

customer_reviews.title: These pens!
customer_reviews.text: I first got to use of these pens staying in a hotel in NYC. I fell in love with them, their unique look and the craftsmanship of it. They are excellent and very comfortable in the hand. Amazingly the refills are pretty cheap which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando G.

customer_reviews.title: Take it anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get the pen... then I saw how it opened and experienced how it wrote and it exceeded all my expectations. Let's see how it lasts over time, but as I have bought Lamy pens for years (and still have all of them), there's little doubt that this one will last too.
customer_reviews.author: nehmeth

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot, but it's very slippery and the pen feels like you have to push hard in order to extend/retract the nib. Other than that, the pen writes fairly dark and is very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Cool pen
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s pretty cool that it shrinks down when you stay with the way
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Pen
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Pico pen; lost the first one. I go practically nowhere without this pen; drop the thing in my pocket and I don't know it's there until I need it. Great conversation piece, too. Most everybody has a comment about it. Oh, and it writes well, too.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Picciarelli

customer_reviews.title: Great portable pen.  Crowd pleaser too.
customer_reviews.text: Great pen, doesn't roll, fits in pockets without any worry for bodily harm, expands for a full size pen. Feels SLIGHTLY flimsy but... ...has a LIFETIME WARRANTY. So I'm not worried about it breaking. What more could you ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Ameatball

customer_reviews.title: Lamy Pico Pen
customer_reviews.text: I found this pen extemely practical for carrying in your trouser pockets and of course, briefcase. Also Lamy has great writing inks
customer_reviews.author: Louie

customer_reviews.title: Great pen
customer_reviews.text: Fits in any pocket. Writes good. Very happy with the purchase. Very easy to change pen ink. You will not be sorry for purchasing this pen
customer_reviews.author: yose

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses it for her everyday activities and loves the originality of this writing tool, it really write well and looks elegant.

customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my assistant - and he loved it!

customer_reviews.title: pocket pen
customer_reviews.text: Great little pocket pen about 3.7" (94mm) closed, but expands to a comfortable length (4.9", 125mm) when you click it.
customer_reviews.author: R Bull

customer_reviews.title: Lasted six months
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar experience to another reviewer in that the internal plastic part broke and the pen is now non-functional. I used it a few times a week and carried it in my purse, so I don't think I abused or overused it. It's too bad, because I really liked it. If it had been cheaper, I would have purchased another, but I think the cost is too high given the lifespan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an epically great pocket pen
customer_reviews.text: This pen gets my best marks for looks, portability, stability, and writing quality. I bought this one as a spare when I thought I had lost my original (subsequently found). My most-used pen.
customer_reviews.author: Will O

customer_reviews.title: Great pen! Easy and convenient to use.
customer_reviews.text: The pen arrived on time and was as described. I have used it for a few weeks now and am very pleased with action to open/close it and it writes like you would expect a Lamy product to. Overall very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: DB Porter

customer_reviews.title: really cool pen
customer_reviews.text: i like writing with it almost as much as i like clicking it open. very smooth operation and a classy exterior make this a fine pen.
customer_reviews.author: royler

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one of these
customer_reviews.text: A great invention - A pen that compresses down to a smaller, smooth shape so that it can easily be kept in a pants pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Objectively Speaking

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love this pen. Both my husband and i have one and carry it everwhere
customer_reviews.author: P Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Best pocket pen ever
customer_reviews.text: I always have this pen in my pocket, and use it all the time. It feels good and works well. It opens with a pleasingly firm spring, and writes beautifully. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: David Smith

customer_reviews.title: Super cool pen
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my dad and I am excited to order more for more gifts and for myself! Super cool pen, so sleek, and so fun to use! Refills are also very affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: fits the spot on the Aston Martin perfectly and lots cheaper than from AM.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pen three days ago and am very satisfied with the pen itself; however, I purchased this one at $45 instead of other listings because it stated it came with BLUE ink. It came with BLACK ink instead, and at an $8 value, the refills do not come cheap. I could have purchased it for $30 from another vendor here, but chose this one because it stated it contained BLUE ink rather than BLACK ink. With the difference in price, I could have bought two ink refills. Absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality-price ratio
customer_reviews.text: You can keep this pen inside the pen pouch and put it in your pants pockets. It's small and handy
customer_reviews.author: JULES

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable pen; perfect for GTD!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE this pen! Have used mine constantly for more than 2 years, tho' it finally ran out of ink... (if you can, you should prob purchase several refills when you get the pen, to save you the trouble of hunting down the refill) It fits in my slacks pocket perfectly (without weighing it down visibly), is available instantly, and feels great in my hand. I'm a little sad that it shows wear on the end after so much use (I have the blue one), but its performance is amazing! Wish that everything I purchased brought me so much pleasure. LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Virtual Victoria

customer_reviews.title: It broke after about a year.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this pen. It wrote well and was convenient to carry. I used it heavily for about a year and carried it with me everywhere. I went through a few refills. An internal plastic part failed and made it unusable after about a year. Very disappointing. Now I carry the Fisher telescoping space pen and have been very satisfied (no plastic parts).
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Clever Little Pen
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and how well it fits in any size pocket. This is not the first pen I have and they are really durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Cartin
